## ListViewItem type

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 


**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ListViewItem = {
    description: string;
    label: string;
    checked?: boolean;
    count?: {
        count: number;
        of: number;
        uom: string;
    };
    date?: string;
    dateFormat?: string;
    debounce?: number;
    linkComponent?: string;
    route?: string;
};
```
